title: Venus Transit in the 7th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the seventh house highlights partnerships, marriage, and public dealings for Leo ascendants. This phase improves harmony in one-to-one relationships and supports agreements based on mutual benefit. Attraction and cooperation increase, making it easier to negotiate, collaborate, and restore balance. While expectations from others may rise, success comes through fairness and emotional maturity rather than dominance.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Romantic bonds feel warmer and supportive

closing: This transit refines how you relate and commit. When equality guides partnerships, connections become a source of strength.
